Package tools.httpserver

Basic HTTP / HTTPS server for Server administration.
Attention: this server is used for convenience in order to avoid the need of installing/configuring external server.
No security audit nor intrusion tests have been performed on it.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HttpConstants HTTP constants used to describe requests and access rights
 

Class Summary
ConfigurationFile Load HttpServer configuration file and replace <!--config--> tag in HTML by configuration content.
FileEditor Provides facilities to edit and save text files stored on disk
Replace following html tags in page: <!-- comment --> \t replaced by server events (save, ...) <!-- error --> \t replaced by server errors %name% \t replaced by file name (without path) <!--filename-->\t replaced by file name (with path) <!--filecontent-->\t replaced by file content
HtmlAuth Create an HTML page for authentification
HtmlFile Create an HTML page using file content stored onto disk.
HtmlModel Define HTML model, which must be extended to create an HTML page usable by server.
HtmlRedirect Define a HTTP redirection message using a 302 or javascript.
HtmlSimple Create a simple HTML page from scratch.
HttpServer Create an HTTP(s) server that can be used for application administration.
HttpVars HTTP tools
InfoPage Generate HTML content representing application version.
Includes some system parameters: OS, architecture, memory
Replace any HTML <!--versions--> tag by generated HTML info
Maintenance Class used to backup/restore configuration
MimeType Define mime types associated with file extension.
Allow server to set correct content type to HTTP message headers.
Methods are static for convenient usage.
Mime types are loaded from file "mime.types" which must be available in project root directory.
File syntax is the same than Apache mime.types file.
PageAdmin HTTP server administration pages
Allows to consult/modify administration parameters
Switch from http to https requires: generating a SSL key and storing it in a keystore. starting server with switches "-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStore=keystore -Djavax.net.ssl.keyStore=keystore -Djavax.net.ssl.keyStorePassword="password"
PageEditor Editor parameters page
Allows to consult/modify editor parameters
PageLogs Logs administration page.
Allows to configure log parameters (path/level)
PoolThreads PoolThreads class allow to manage a thread pool for client connections.
ShowLogs Allows to consult log files.
Read the last 200 lines from log file and replace: %name% by log file name %lines% by number of loaded lines <!--logfile--> by lines loaded from log file
SslSocketFactory SSL server Factory, used to create SSL server from raw certificate (without JVM options) Supports keystore/SSL certificate creation, loading and saving
TextTools Tools to manipulate various encoding.
Supports hexa<=>ascii encoding/decoding and utf8<=>ascii decoding
User Simple user account class
UserSession Thread allowing to manage a connection between a user (web browser) and the http(s) server.
UserTransaction This class integrate methods to analyze HTTP message between a client (browser) and the http(s) server.
 

Enum Summary
HttpConstants.METHOD HTTP request methods
HttpConstants.RIGHTS Access rights that can be attached to a user connection to administration server
 

Package tools.httpserver Description

Basic HTTP / HTTPS server for Server administration.
Attention: this server is used for convenience in order to avoid the need of installing/configuring external server.
No security audit nor intrusion tests have been performed on it. It should therefore NOT be used in production environment without adding additional security mechanisms: dedicated interface, firewall, etc.
